MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the ML3 postcode area of Hamilton. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:54pm. Our engineers are on their way to the area to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:00am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated 10:11pm on 5th December 2020.
